item.title: Affinity, targeting office workers over pros, making pro tools the loss leader
item.description:
Technically, there are more than ever, based on Adobe’s own numbers—as of last year, 37 million people subscribed to Creative Cloud, which is still more than Canva’s 24 million paid users. That ensures some will buy. If Canva can get more than 6 normies for every professional Adobe serves, they come out ahead.
